channel.title: Abouts on melkorm's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on melkorm's blog

item.title: About meh
item.description:
Programmer since 2002 when I wrote my first program in TurboPascal, of course it was a calculator - who would write anything else back then ? Serious programming started around my 1st year at studies when I took my first job - taking care of Polish biggest club portal.

Mostly I code in PHP . Tho I like to code in GO and Python, sometimes in Bash when the hammer is needed.

What this blog will be about ? Hell no idea, will update this section when I have an one!

Enjoy!
